Name: Taurus Territorial Industries
Description: Taurus Territorial Industries is the largest weapons manufacturer in the Taurian Concordat. Geared towards offensive and defensive weapons production, TTI was created in the late 2700s and is heavily subsidized by the government. The company's main production centers are located in Jansen's Hold, Sterope and Taurus.
ReputationStatements: TTI has a temporary contract for you mercenary, if you're interested.

MissionSuccessStatements: You have made me earn a nice bonus commander. TTI thanks you for your effort.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Yeah, I'd figure it wouldn't be easy. Still, your company might also be more green than I expected.
BadFaithFailureStatements: TTI doesn't like failure Commander. Perhaps you'll learn it until next time.
